S04n266:8: ekasmin samaye bhagavān buddhaḥ sāgaranāgarājāvasathe viharati sma sārddhaṃ sārdhadvādaśaśatabhikṣūṇāṃ mahāsaṃghena bahubhiśca bodhisattvamahāsattvaiḥ |
S04n266:10: caturṇāṃ dharmoddānānāmabhidhāne kriyamāṇe tadabhidhānena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇāmabhidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati |
S04n266:12: sarveṣāṃ saṃskārāṇām anityatāyāṃ bodhisattvānaṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nirdiṣṭamakṣayajñānaṃ pravartate |
S04n266:13: sarveṣāṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ duḥkhatāyāṃ bodhisattvānaṃ mahāsattvānāṃ rnirdiṣṭamakṣayajñānaṃ pravartate |
S04n266:14: sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇām anātmatāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nirdiṣṭamakṣayajñānaṃ pravartate |
S04n266:17: eteṣāṃ caturṇāṃ dharmoddānānāmabhidhāne kriyamāṇe tadabhidhānena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇāmabhidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati |
S04n266:19: āttamanaso bhikṣavaḥ sarve ca bodhisattvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti |
S04n266:21: bhāratīyopādhyāyena surendrabodhinā mahālocāvā-vandejñānasenena cedamanūditaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ ca |
